title: My XP Boosts Didn't Activate When I Bought Them
body: I have now bought 3 boosts which consist of two 10 game win xp boosts and a one week xp boosts and i thought it was automatically activated but when i hovered over the xp icon in my profile (this is the new client btw) and it says that there are "no active boosts". i've just spent almost 15 bucks for nothing and i don't know how to activate them. Please Help! I am posting this from my main account "BabyBackBard", but the account I bought the boosts on were my surf which is "One Girl 2 Fists".

replies.body:
I don't see any day boosts on the account currently, but I do see that you currently have XP Win Boosts remaining.  Are you on the updated client?  If so, can you see you r active boosts on the legacy:

  -  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know!
